mapper.select: select cc.id,cc.gmt_create,co.id as courseId,co.title,co.price,co.lesson_num,t.`name` as teacherName,co.cover from edu_course_collect cc left join edu_course co on cc.course_id = co.id left join edu_teacher t on co.teacher_id = t.id where cc.member_id = #{memberId} order by cc.gmt_create desc
